description:
Neneko and her aunt visit Rokuhoudou, but she’s skeptical that it won’t let her aunt down again. A TV program sparks a Napolitan spaghetti boom. Rokuhoudou struggles to keep up with the demand.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kanojo wa Mada Rokuhoudou o Shiranai / Kissaten no Napolitan
She Doesn`t Know Rokuhoudou Yet / The Cafe`s Napolitan
彼女はまだ鹿楓堂を知らない / 喫茶店のナポリタン
